Berapa Target Kunjungan Turis ke Indonesia, Wishnutama?
05 Nov 2019, 19:53 by Afif Farhan


Foto: Afif Farhan/detikcom

Jakarta - Tahun 2019, target kunjungan turis ke Indonesia adalah 20 juta. Bagaimana di periode Menteri Pariwisata dan Ekonomi Kreatif (Menparekraf) Wishnutama?Wishnutama kini menjabat sebagai Menparekraf bersama Angela Tanoesoedibjo sebagai wakilnya. Urusan pengembangan sampai promosi pariwisata, termasuk sektor ekonomi kreatif ada di tangannya.Lantas, bagaimana soal kunjungan turis mancanegara ke Indonesia?"Numbers masih menghitung berapa yang kita capai tahun ini, berapa devisa yang kita hasilkan, berapa wisman (wisatawan mancanegara) yang datang," terang Wishnutama dalam acara Ngopi Bareng Mas Tama dan Mbak Angela yang digelar Kementerian Pariwisata dan Ekonomi Kreatif di M Bloc Space, Jakarta Selatan, Selasa (5/11/2019).Wishnutama mengaku masih melakukan perhitungan angka turis yang datang ke Indonesia dan kesiapan destinasi wisata. Khususnya, di 10 Destinasi Prioritas dan di 5 Destinasi Super Prioritas."Kita belum tahu, tahun depan berapa target kunjungannya. Kita harus hitung dengan baik apalagi menyebutkan angka," ujarnya.Sebelum Wishnutama, menteri pariwisata sebelumnya Arief Yahya diberikan target kunjungan turis sebanyak 20 juta di tahun 2019. Melihat data Badan Pusat Statistik (BPS) sampai September 2019, angkanya baru di 12,2 juta."Tentu ada banyak faktor yang mempengaruhi kedatangan turis seperti bencana alam, travel warning dan lain sebagainya," tutup pria yang akrab disapa Tama ini.Simak Video "Kembangkan 5 Destinasi Wisata Prioritas, Wishnutama Ingin Libatkan YouTuber"[Gambas:Video 20detik](aff/krs)

What is the Target of Tourist Visit to Indonesia, Wishnutama?
05 Nov 2019, 19:53 by Afif Farhan


Photo: Afif Farhan / detikcom

Jakarta - In 2019, the target of tourist visits to Indonesia is 20 million. How in the period of the Minister of Tourism and Creative Economy (Menparekraf) Wishnutama? Wishnutama now serves as Menparekraf with Angela Tanoesoedibjo as his deputy. The matter of development to the promotion of tourism, including the creative economy sector is in his hands. Then, what about foreign tourist visits to Indonesia? "Numbers are still counting how much we have achieved this year, how much foreign exchange we produce, how many foreign tourists (foreign tourists) come, "Wishnutama explained in the Coffee Cup event with Mas Tama and Mbak Angela, which was held by the Ministry of Tourism and Creative Economy at M Bloc Space, South Jakarta, Tuesday (11/05/2019). Wishnutama claimed to still calculate the number of tourists coming to Indonesia and the readiness of destinations tour. Specifically, in the 10 Priority Destinations and in the 5 Super Priority Destinations, "We don't know yet, what next target the visit will be. We have to calculate well let alone mention the numbers," he said. Before Wishnutama, the previous tourism minister Arief Yahya was given a target of 20 tourist visits million in 2019. Looking at data from the Central Statistics Agency (BPS) until September 2019, the figure is only 12.2 million. "Of course there are many factors that affect tourist arrivals such as natural disasters, travel warnings and so on," concluded the man who is familiarly called Tama.
